profile_summary:
As a Senior Node Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in **Node.js**, **API** development, and **system integration**, leveraging my proficiency in **Docker** for containerization and deployment. I am well-versed in implementing industry-standard protocols such as **OAuth2**, **SAML**, and **SSO**, alongside building RESTful services to ensure seamless communication between systems. My solid background in **React** enables me to create dynamic user interfaces that interact confidently with backend services, enhancing the client-facing experience.

I have a strong commitment to CI/CD practices, utilizing **infrastructure-as-code** methodologies to automate deployments and maintain reliability. Additionally, I possess substantial experience in debugging and documentation, ensuring that robust solutions are not only effective but also maintainable. My unique blend of technical prowess, including a familiarity with **Golang** and **module bundling**, is complemented by my ability to communicate effectively with stakeholders and client teams, driving project success.
